articles.author: Connor Jones
articles.title: Atlassian cranks up the threat meter to max for Confluence authorization flaw - The Register
articles.description: Attackers secure admin rights after vendor said they could only steal data
articles.content:
Atlassian reassessed the severity rating of the recent improper authorization vulnerability in Confluence Data Center and Server, raising the CVSS score from 9.1 to a maximum of 10.

articles.title: Bad eIDAS: Europe ready to intercept, spy on your encrypted HTTPS connections - The Register
articles.description: EFF warns incoming rules may return web 'to the dark ages of 2011'
articles.content:
Lawmakers in Europe are expected to adopt digital identity rules that civil society groups say will make the internet less secure and open up citizens to online surveillance.
